ing: 1 (14.5 ounce) can prepared whole-berry cranberry sauce
des: "I started making this when I was 11-years-old; it's been a hit with the family ever since. It's fast and easy to make."
ins: Mix together the cranberries, whipped topping, and cream cheese in a bowl. Spread the mixture into the bottom of the prepared pie crust. Cover the pie with plastic wrap. Freeze at least 1 hour.
